trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There were no other sightings in Worcester on or around September 17th 2013
Summary: My daughter and i stepped out onto the deck, we noticed what look like comets, i didnt think they were jets because they didnt leave a longlasting trail,the trail seemed to move with the object
divs: Sighting DetailsHi, my daughters and I stepped out on the deck to smoke. It was in the evening around 6:30pm ,I looked up like I always do and I noticed what looked like comets , and I said to my daughter, HEY LOOK, COMETS! We watched two of them acending northward, my daughter said she thought they were jets.. I said no because the trail that the objects left behind seem to move with the object, a jet stream leaves a lasting trail, I told my daughter to get the binoculars to get a better look . She ran up the hill which is our backyard to get a view but as she was doing that i told her DID YOU SEE THAT! It was a round shape thing that appeared as the comet looking objects were acending , I ran to get the camera , when I retured within a minute it was gone, then the comet shaped objects stopped acsending and stopped in midair and it formed into a disk shape at an angle and stayed stationary for at least a minte and half, I tried to take pics of the staionary objects, but the they blended with the setting sun and it was like they've disenigrated and nothing showed up on the camera, but I was able to capture a picture of the comet shaped object. I felt more exicited than scared, but I did feel that I needed to report it. Thank you
